## Metadata collection

During COVID-19 pandemic, data and metadata collection was crucial.

::: {.fragments .fade-up}
@gill_dataharmonizer_2023 developped a spreadsheet-like tool to [help]{.orange}!
:::

## DataHarmonizer

::: incremental
-   Load metadata standards
-   Easy navigation based on:
    -   Sections of metadata fields
    -   Metadata requirements
-   Display expected values
-   Validate the metadata values
:::

## NMDC submission portal

> Leverage DataHarmonizer to lower barriers to collect, study and biosample data

Receive guidance on how to meet standards
